title: Digital Storytelling-Based English Writing Proficiency Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English grammar and vocabulary understanding, fundamental digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Online classes centered on collaborative tasks in smartphone-based learning environments for elementary school in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can complete three short stories of 500 words each in English using digital storytelling tools.
Learners can collaborate with peer teachers to provide and incorporate feedback on English writing assignments.
Learners can apply vocabulary and expressions acquired during the digital storytelling creation process to actual English writing activities.

resources: Smartphone-Based Digital Storytelling Apps (e.g., Canva, StoryJumper)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
